StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllEduca.onMajor]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: AS --create a table variable to hold the majors DECLARE @educa.oncodes table (ID int ,code varchar(2) ,[descrip.on] varchar(80)) --Insert major code 00 .rst so it defaults to this. insert into @educa.oncodes SELECT -1 AS ID ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] AS Code ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_DESCRIPT] AS Descrip.on FROM [dbo].[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] = '00' --Insert the other majors in alphabe.cal order insert into @educa.oncodes SELECT -1 AS ID ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] AS Code ,[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_DESCRIPT] AS Descrip.on FROM [dbo].[CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] <> '00' ORDER BY [CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_DESCRIPT] --return the table variable select * from @educa.oncodes
